issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: With HDFS Trash enabled but its encryption zone lower than Hive data directory, insert overwrite command silently fails to trash the existing files during overwrite, which could lead to unexpected incorrect results (more rows returned than expected)
fields.summary: Insert overwrite in same encrypted zone silently fails to remove some existing files

comments.body: Patch has been submitted to https://reviews.apache.org/r/40628/ for review. Thanks in advanced.
Include the new qtest encryption_with_trash.q in encrypted.query.files list.
